dependencies.description:
CLAPACK is a f2c'ed version of LAPACK. The CLAPACK library was built
using a Fortran to C conversion utility called f2c. The entire Fortran
77 LAPACK library is run through f2c to obtain C code, and then modified
to improve readability. CLAPACK's goal is to provide LAPACK for someone
who does not have access to a Fortran compiler.
dependencies.name: clapack

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

description:
PHAST is a freely available software package for comparative and
evolutionary genomics.
name: phast

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
